channel.title: Connecting to server help!
channel.description: hey guys I portforwarded my server and it says it's online when i use runelocus server status check thing. But when i try and log in it doesnt work for me it just freezes as if no server is on but when other people try it it works... help me please?

item.title: Connecting to server help!
item.dc:creator: @lineage lineage
item.description:
@lineage wrote:

mapConfig.txt is missing Add it into your Cache

Read full topic

item.title: Connecting to server help!
item.dc:creator: @nikolaww3 nikolaww3
item.description:
@nikolaww3 wrote:

[quote=“luna-scape, post:4, topic:477538”]You must change the localhost to 127.0.01.
Otherwise the localhost cant connect.

If it just freezes the client when u logged in.
U probably spawned an wrong item or you are on a wrong place or you are (ip) banned.
An easy fix is delete your playerfile.
But please provide some more information or media…[/quote]
well this is what it says in the client when i run it in eclipse java.io.FileNotFoundException: nullMaps\mapConfig.txt (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.setNewMaps(client.java:149) at client.startUp(client.java:8836) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:80) at client.run(client.java:6065) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

Read full topic

item.title: Connecting to server help!
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

You must change the localhost to 127.0.01.
Otherwise the localhost cant connect.

If it just freezes the client when u logged in.
U probably spawned an wrong item or you are on a wrong place or you are (ip) banned.
An easy fix is delete your playerfile.
But please provide some more information or media…

Read full topic

item.title: Connecting to server help!
item.dc:creator: @aciraccar aciraccar
item.description:
@aciraccar wrote:

that problem happens mostly on 562 Servers on certain Pcs

Read full topic
